markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 638 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

A visual effect can affect only creatures that can see it. This applies only to visible parts of the effect, as determined by the GM.
name: Visual
